messages.content:

The path provided is a directory, and I need the specific file that contains the SSH key. I should list the contents of the directory to find the correct file.

<final_answer></final_answer>

[{'name': 'id_rsa', 'type': 'file', 'permissions': {'read': True, 'write': False, 'execute': False}}, {'name': 'id_rsa.pub', 'type': 'file', 'permissions': {'read': True, 'write': True, 'execute': False}}]

<function_thought>
The directory "/system/.ssh" contains two files: "id_rsa" and "id_rsa.pub". The public SSH key is typically in the "id_rsa.pub" file. I should read the contents of this file to retrieve the public key.
</function_thought>

<function_call>[read_file(path="/system/.ssh/id_rsa.pub")]</function_call>

<final_answer></final_answer>
